verses.verse: ( The Resurrection) ( ( 470 28:1-10 ; 490 24:1-12 ; 500 20:1-9 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When διαγενομένου <WG1230> diagenomenou was over , τοῦ <WG3588> tou the σαββάτου <WG4521> sabbatou Sabbath Μαρία <WG3137> Maria Mary ἡ <WG3588> hē - Μαγδαληνὴ <WG3094> Magdalēnē Magdalene , καὶ <WG2532> kai - Μαρία <WG3137> Maria Mary ἡ <WG3588> hē the [mother] τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Ἰακώβου <WG2385> Iakōbou of James , καὶ <WG2532> kai and Σαλώμη <WG4539> Salōmē Salome ἠγόρασαν <WG59> ēgorasan bought ἀρώματα <WG759> arōmata spices ἵνα <WG2443> hina so ἐλθοῦσαι <WG2064> elthousai they could go ἀλείψωσιν <WG218> aleipsōsin [and] anoint αὐτόν <WG846> auton [the body of Jesus] .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - λίαν <WG3029> lian Very πρωῒ <WG4404> prōi early τῇ <WG3588> tē on the μιᾷ <WG1520> mia first [day] τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the σαββάτων <WG4521> sabbatōn week , ( Literally And very early on the first of the Sabbaths,) ἔρχονται <WG2064> erchontai they went ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi to τὸ <WG3588> to the μνημεῖον* <WG3419> mnēmeion tomb . ἀνατείλαντος <WG393> anateilantos . . . , τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἡλίου <WG2246> hēliou just after sunrise

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon They were asking πρὸς <WG4314> pros - ἑαυτάς <WG1438> heautas one another , Τίς <WG5101> Tis “ Who ἀποκυλίσει <WG617> apokylisei will roll away ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin - τὸν <WG3588> ton the λίθον <WG3037> lithon stone ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῆς <WG3588> tēs the θύρας <WG2374> thyras entrance τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the μνημείου <WG3419> mnēmeiou tomb ? ”

καὶ <WG2532> kai But ἀναβλέψασαι <WG308> anablepsasai when they looked up , θεωροῦσιν <WG2334> theōrousin they saw ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἀποκεκύλισται* <WG617> apokekylistai had been rolled away , ὁ <WG3588> ho the λίθος <WG3037> lithos stone ἦν <WG1510> ēn it was γὰρ <WG1063> gar even though μέγας <WG3173> megas large . σφόδρα <WG4970> sphodra extremely

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When εἰσελθοῦσαι <WG1525> eiselthousai they entered εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸ <WG3588> to the μνημεῖον <WG3419> mnēmeion tomb , εἶδον <WG3708> eidon they saw νεανίσκον <WG3495> neaniskon a young man καθήμενον <WG2521> kathēmenon sitting ἐν <WG1722> en on τοῖς <WG3588> tois the δεξιοῖς <WG1188> dexiois right side , περιβεβλημένον <WG4016> peribeblēmenon dressed in στολὴν <WG4749> stolēn robe λευκήν <WG3022> leukēn a white καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐξεθαμβήθησαν <WG1568> exethambēthēsan they were alarmed .

ὁ <WG3588> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de But λέγει <WG3004> legei he said αὐταῖς <WG846> autais to them , Μὴ <WG3361> Mē “ Do not ἐκθαμβεῖσθε <WG1568> ekthambeisthe be alarmed . Ἰησοῦν <WG2424> Iēsoun Jesus ζητεῖτε <WG2212> zēteite You are looking for τὸν <WG3588> ton the Ναζαρηνὸν <WG3479> Nazarēnon Nazarene , τὸν <WG3588> ton who ἐσταυρωμένον <WG4717> estaurōmenon was crucified . ἠγέρθη <WG1453> ēgerthē He has risen ! οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἔστιν <WG1510> estin He is ὧδε <WG5602> hōde here ! ἴδε <WG2400> ide See ὁ <WG3588> ho the τόπος <WG5117> topos place ὅπου <WG3699> hopou where ἔθηκαν <WG5087> ethēkan they put αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him .

ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla But ὑπάγετε <WG5217> hypagete go , εἴπατε <WG2036> eipate tell τοῖς <WG3588> tois - μαθηταῖς <WG3101> mathētais disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῷ <WG3588> tō - Πέτρῳ <WG4074> Petrō Peter ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , Προάγει <WG4254> Proagei ‘ He is going ahead of ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn - Γαλιλαίαν <WG1056> Galilaian Galilee . ἐκεῖ <WG1563> ekei There αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him , ὄψεσθε <WG3708> opsesthe you will see καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs just as εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen He told ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . ’”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai So ἐξελθοῦσαι <WG1831> exelthousai [the women] left ἔφυγον <WG5343> ephygon and ran away , ἀπὸ <WG575> apo . . . τοῦ <WG3588> tou the μνημείου <WG3419> mnēmeiou tomb εἶχεν <WG2192> eichen vvv γὰρ <WG1063> gar - αὐτὰς <WG846> autas - τρόμος <WG5156> tromos trembling καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔκστασις <WG1611> ekstasis bewildered . καὶ <WG2532> kai And οὐδενὶ <WG3762> oudeni [a word to anyone] . ( Early manuscripts end the Gospel of Mark after verse 8. Other manuscripts contain only a short ending, a version of the following: 9But they quickly reported all these instructions to Peter’s companions. Afterward, Jesus Himself, through them, sent out from east to west the sacred and imperishable proclamation of eternal salvation. Amen.) οὐδὲν <WG3762> ouden . . . εἶπαν <WG2036> eipan they did not say ἐφοβοῦντο <WG5399> ephobounto in their fear γάρ <WG1063> gar vvv

«Ἀναστὰς <WG450> Anastas after [Jesus] had risen , ( Or After Jesus had risen early on the first day of the week) δὲ <WG1161> de - ( Jesus Appears to Mary Magdalene) πρωῒ <WG4404> prōi Early πρώτῃ <WG4413> prōtē [on the] first [day] σαββάτου <WG4521> sabbatou of the week , ἐφάνη <WG5316> ephanē He appeared πρῶτον <WG4412> prōton first Μαρίᾳ <WG3137> Maria to Mary τῇ <WG3588> tē - Μαγδαληνῇ <WG3094> Magdalēnē Magdalene , παρ’ <WG3844> par’ from ἧς <WG3739> hēs whom ἐκβεβλήκει <WG1544> ekbeblēkei He had driven out ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven δαιμόνια <WG1140> daimonia demons .

ἐκείνη <WG1565> ekeinē She πορευθεῖσα <WG4198> poreutheisa went ἀπήγγειλεν <WG518> apēngeilen [and] told τοῖς <WG3588> tois those μετ’ <WG3326> met’ with αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him , γενομένοις <WG1096> genomenois who had been πενθοῦσι <WG3996> penthousi who were mourning καὶ <WG2532> kai and κλαίουσιν <WG2799> klaiousin weeping .

κἀκεῖνοι <WG2548> kakeinoi And when they ἀκούσαντες <WG191> akousantes heard ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ζῇ <WG2198> zē [Jesus] was alive καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐθεάθη <WG2300> etheathē she had seen Him ὑπ’ <WG5259> hyp’ . . . αὐτῆς <WG846> autēs . . . , ἠπίστησαν <WG569> ēpistēsan they did not believe [it] .

Μετὰ <WG3326> Meta After ( Jesus Appears to Two Disciples) δὲ <WG1161> de - ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta [this] , δυσὶν <WG1417> dysin to two ἐξ <WG1537> ex of αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn them περιπατοῦσιν <WG4043> peripatousin as they walked ἐφανερώθη <WG5319> ephanerōthē [Jesus] appeared ἐν <WG1722> en in ἑτέρᾳ <WG2087> hetera a different μορφῇ <WG3444> morphē form πορευομένοις <WG4198> poreuomenois along εἰς <WG1519> eis in ἀγρόν <WG68> agron [the] country .

κἀκεῖνοι <WG2548> kakeinoi And they ἀπελθόντες <WG565> apelthontes went back ἀπήγγειλαν <WG518> apēngeilan and reported [it] τοῖς <WG3588> tois to the λοιποῖς <WG3062> loipois rest , οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude either . ἐκείνοις <WG1565> ekeinois them ἐπίστευσαν <WG4100> episteusan but they did not believe

Ὕστερον <WG5305> Hysteron Later , ( The Great Commission) δὲ <WG1161> de - ἀνακειμένοις <WG345> anakeimenois were eating , αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois as they τοῖς <WG3588> tois to the ἕνδεκα <WG1733> hendeka Eleven ἐφανερώθη <WG5319> ephanerōthē [Jesus] appeared καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὠνείδισεν <WG3679> ōneidisen rebuked them τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἀπιστίαν <WG570> apistian unbelief αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn for their καὶ <WG2532> kai and σκληροκαρδίαν <WG4641> sklērokardian hardness of heart , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because τοῖς <WG3588> tois those θεασαμένοις <WG2300> theasamenois who had seen αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him ἐγηγερμένον <WG1453> egēgermenon after He had risen . οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐπίστευσαν <WG4100> episteusan they did not believe

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen He said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , Πορευθέντες <WG4198> Poreuthentes “ Go εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world ἅπαντα <WG537> hapanta all κηρύξατε <WG2784> kēryxate [and] preach τὸ <WG3588> to the εὐαγγέλιον <WG2098> euangelion gospel πάσῃ <WG3956> pasē to every τῇ <WG3588> tē - κτίσει <WG2937> ktisei creature .

ὁ <WG3588> ho Whoever πιστεύσας <WG4100> pisteusas believes καὶ <WG2532> kai and βαπτισθεὶς <WG907> baptistheis is baptized σωθήσεται <WG4982> sōthēsetai will be saved , ὁ <WG3588> ho whoever δὲ <WG1161> de but ἀπιστήσας <WG569> apistēsas does not believe κατακριθήσεται <WG2632> katakrithēsetai will be condemned .

σημεῖα <WG4592> sēmeia signs δὲ <WG1161> de And τοῖς <WG3588> tois those πιστεύσασιν <WG4100> pisteusasin who believe : ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these παρακολουθήσει <WG5023> parakolouthēsei will accompany ἐν <WG1722> en In τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὀνόματί <WG3686> onomati name μου <WG1473> mou My δαιμόνια <WG1140> daimonia demons ; ἐκβαλοῦσιν <WG1544> ekbalousin they will drive out γλώσσαις <WG1100> glōssais tongues ; ( WH in tongues) λαλήσουσιν <WG2980> lalēsousin they will speak καιναῖς <WG2537> kainais in new

[και <WG2532> kai - ἐν <WG1722> en with ταῖς <WG3588> tais their χερσὶν] <WG5495> chersin hands , ὄφεις <WG3789> opheis snakes ἀροῦσιν <WG142> arousin they will pick up κἂν <WG2579> kan and if θανάσιμόν <WG2286> thanasimon deadly poison , τι <WG5100> ti any πίωσιν <WG4095> piōsin they drink οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous them ; βλάψῃ <WG984> blapsē it will not harm ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on ἀρρώστους <WG732> arrōstous [the] sick , χεῖρας <WG5495> cheiras [their] hands ἐπιθήσουσιν <WG2007> epithēsousin they will lay καὶ <WG2532> kai and καλῶς <WG2573> kalōs well . ” ἕξουσιν <WG2192> hexousin they will be made

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho the μὲν <WG3303> men - ( The Ascension) οὖν <WG3767> oun - Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios Lord Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus μετὰ <WG3326> meta After τὸ <WG3588> to - λαλῆσαι <WG2980> lalēsai had spoken αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , ἀνελήμφθη <WG353> anelēmphthē He was taken up εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸν <WG3588> ton - οὐρανὸν <WG3772> ouranon heaven καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐκάθισεν <WG2523> ekathisen sat down ἐκ <WG1537> ek at δεξιῶν <WG1188> dexiōn [the] right hand τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God .

ἐκεῖνοι <WG1565> ekeinoi they δὲ <WG1161> de And ἐξελθόντες <WG1831> exelthontes went out ἐκήρυξαν <WG2784> ekēryxan [and] preached πανταχοῦ <WG3837> pantachou everywhere , τοῦ <WG3588> tou [and] the Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord συνεργοῦντος <WG4903> synergountos worked through [them] , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὸν <WG3588> ton [His] λόγον <WG3056> logon word βεβαιοῦντος <WG950> bebaiountos confirming διὰ <WG1223> dia by τῶν <WG3588> tōn the ἐπακολουθούντων <WG1872> epakolouthountōn that accompanied [it] . σημείων <WG4592> sēmeiōn signs
